div.p: The system dynamics model created during this study is available in full online at: https://exchange.iseesystems.com/models/player/arielle-selya/youth-smoking-and-anti-smoking-policies-in-north-dakota. The datasets used to calibrate the model are publicly available from the Monitoring the Future Study, waves 1992â€“2013, www.monitoringthefuture.org.
